verses.verse: וַתִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> lifted me up אֹתִ֜י <WH853> ר֗וּחַ <WH7307> Moreover the spirit וַתָּבֵ֣א <WH935> and brought אֹ֠תִי <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about שַׁ֨עַר <WH8179> gate בֵּית־ <WH1004> house יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S הַקַּדְמוֹנִי֙ <WH6931> me unto the east הַפּוֹנֶ֣ה <WH6437> which looketh קָדִ֔ימָה <WH6921> eastward וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> and behold בְּפֶ֣תַח <WH6607> and behold at the door הַשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> of the gate עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <WH2568> five אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> men וָאֶרְאֶ֨ה <WH7200> whom I saw בְתוֹכָ֜ם <WH8432> among אֶת־ <WH853> יַאֲזַנְיָ֧ה <WH2970> Jaazaniah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son עַזֻּ֛ר <WH5809> of Azur וְאֶת־ <WH853> פְּלַטְיָ֥הוּ <WH6410> and Pelatiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son בְּנָיָ֖הוּ <WH1141> of Benaiah שָׂרֵ֖י <WH8269> princes הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> of the people פ

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> he unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> these הָאֲנָשִׁ֞ים <WH376> are the men הַחֹשְׁבִ֥ים <WH2803> that devise אָ֛וֶן <WH205> mischief וְהַיֹּעֲצִ֥ים <WH3289> and give עֲצַת־ <WH6098> counsel רָ֖ע <WH7451> wicked בָּעִ֥יר <WH5892> in this city הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> who

הָאֹ֣מְרִ֔ים <WH559> Which say לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not בְקָר֖וֹב <WH7138> [It is] not near בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1129> let us build בָּתִּ֑ים <WH1004> houses הִ֣יא <WH1931> he הַסִּ֔יר <WH5518> this [city is] the caldron וַאֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> we הַבָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> and we [be] the flesh
לָכֵ֖ן <WH3651> Therefore הִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> Therefore prophesy עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> against הִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> against them prophesy בֶּן־ <WH1121> O son אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of man

וַתִּפֹּ֣ל <WH5307> fell עָלַי֮ <WH5921> Then ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> And the Spirit יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> upon me and said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me אֱמֹר֙ <WH559> unto me Speak כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> So אֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> Thus have ye said בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמַעֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> the things that come רֽוּחֲכֶ֖ם <WH7307> into your mind אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְדַעְתִּֽיהָ׃ <WH3045> for I know

הִרְבֵּיתֶ֥ם <WH7235> Ye have multiplied חַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH2491> your slain בָּעִ֣יר <WH5892> in this city הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise וּמִלֵּאתֶ֥ם <WH4390> and ye have filled חוּצֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH2351> the streets חָלָֽל׃ <WH2491> thereof with the slain פ

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> GOD חַלְלֵיכֶם֙ <WH2491> Your slain אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom שַׂמְתֶּ֣ם <WH7760> whom ye have laid בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> in the midst הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> of the city הַבָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> of it they [are] the flesh וְהִ֣יא <WH1931> and this הַסִּ֑יר <WH5518> and this [city is] the caldron וְאֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> הוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> but I will bring you forth מִתּוֹכָֽהּ׃ <WH8432> out of the midst

חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> the sword יְרֵאתֶ֑ם <WH3372> Ye have feared וְחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> a sword אָבִ֣יא <WH935> and I will bring עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> and נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> upon you saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֤י <WH3318> And I will bring you out אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> מִתּוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> of the midst וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> thereof and deliver אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בְּיַד־ <WH3027> you into the hands זָרִ֑ים <WH2114> of strangers וְעָשִׂ֛יתִי <WH6213> and will execute בָכֶ֖ם שְׁפָטִֽים׃ <WH8201> judgments

בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> by the sword תִּפֹּ֔לוּ <WH5307> Ye shall fall עַל־ <WH5921> and גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> you in the border יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶשְׁפּ֣וֹט <WH8199> I will judge אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD

הִ֗יא <WH1931> This לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become לָכֶם֙ לְסִ֔יר <WH5518> This [city] shall not be your caldron וְאַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> you תִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become בְתוֹכָ֖הּ <WH8432> in the midst לְבָשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> neither shall ye be the flesh אֶל־ <WH413> to גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> you in the border יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶשְׁפֹּ֥ט <WH8199> thereof [but] I will judge אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <WH3045> And ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> my בְּחֻקַּי֙ <WH2706> in my statutes לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor הֲלַכְתֶּ֔ם <WH1980> for ye have not walked וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <WH4941> my judgments לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor עֲשִׂיתֶ֑ם <WH6213> neither executed וּֽכְמִשְׁפְּטֵ֧י <WH4941> after the manners הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <WH1471> of the heathen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5439> that [are] round about עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <WH6213> but have done

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came כְּהִנָּ֣בְאִ֔י <WH5012> And it came to pass when I prophesied וּפְלַטְיָ֥הוּ <WH6410> that Pelatiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son בְּנָיָ֖ה <WH1141> of Benaiah מֵ֑ת <WH4191> died וָאֶפֹּ֨ל <WH5307> Then fell I down עַל־ <WH5921> on פָּנַ֜י <WH6440> upon my face וָאֶזְעַ֣ק <WH2199> and cried קוֹל־ <WH6963> voice גָּד֗וֹל <WH1419> with a loud וָאֹמַר֙ <WH559> and said אֲהָהּ֙ <WH162> Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD כָּלָה֙ <WH3617> a full end אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> will You עֹשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> wilt thou make אֵ֖ת <WH853> שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <WH7611> of the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man אַחֶ֤יךָ <WH251> thy brethren אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> [even] thy brethren אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> the men גְאֻלָּתֶ֔ךָ <WH1353> of thy kindred וְכָל־ <WH3605> and the whole בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel כֻּלֹּ֑ה <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whom אָמְר֨וּ <WH559> have said לָהֶ֜ם יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> wholly [are] they unto whom the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem רַֽחֲקוּ֙ <WH7368> Get you far מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> from the LORD לָ֥נוּ הִ֛יא <WH1931> this נִתְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> given הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> unto us is this land לְמוֹרָשָֽׁה׃ <WH4181> in possession ס

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> Therefore אֱמֹ֗ר <WH559> Therefore say כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> GOD כִּ֤י <WH3588> Though הִרְחַקְתִּים֙ <WH7368> Although I have cast them far off בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> among the heathen וְכִ֥י <WH3588> and though הֲפִֽיצוֹתִ֖ים <WH6327> and although I have scattered בָּאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> them among the countries וָאֱהִ֤י <WH1961> become לָהֶם֙ לְמִקְדָּ֣שׁ <WH4720> sanctuary מְעַ֔ט <WH4592> yet will I be to them as a little בָּאֲרָצ֖וֹת <WH776> in the countries אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> where בָּ֥אוּ <WH935> where they shall come שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it ס

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> Therefore אֱמֹ֗ר <WH559> Therefore say כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3068> GOD וְקִבַּצְתִּ֤י <WH6908> I will even gather אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> from הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> you from the people וְאָסַפְתִּ֣י <WH622> and assemble אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> out הָ֣אֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> you out of the countries אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נְפֹצוֹתֶ֖ם <WH6327> where ye have been scattered בָּהֶ֑ם וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> and I will give לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> אַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> you the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וּבָ֖אוּ־ <WH935> And they shall come שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> there וְהֵסִ֜ירוּ <WH5493> thither and they shall take away אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שִׁקּוּצֶ֛יהָ <WH8251> all the detestable things וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all תּוֹעֲבוֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH8441> thereof and all the abominations מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <WH4480> and I

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> And I will give לָהֶם֙ לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> them one וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> spirit חֲדָשָׁ֖ה <WH2319> a new אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> and I will put בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <WH7130> within וַהֲסִ֨רֹתִ֜י <WH5493> you and I will take לֵ֤ב <WH3820> heart הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <WH68> the stony מִבְּשָׂרָ֔ם <WH1320> out of their flesh וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> and will give לָהֶ֖ם לֵ֥ב <WH3820> them an heart בָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> of flesh

לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> because of בְּחֻקֹּתַ֣י <WH2708> in my statutes יֵלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> may walk וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטַ֥י <WH4941> mine ordinances יִשְׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> and keep וְעָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> and do אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וְהָיוּ־ <WH1961> become לִ֣י לְעָ֔ם <WH5971> them and they shall be my people וַאֲנִ֕י <WH589> I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָהֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> and I will be their God

וְאֶל־ <WH413> about לֵ֧ב <WH3820> But [as for them] whose heart שִׁקּוּצֵיהֶ֛ם <WH8251> of their detestable things וְתוֹעֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8441> and their abominations לִבָּ֣ם <WH3820> after the heart הֹלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> walketh דַּרְכָּם֙ <WH1870> their way בְּרֹאשָׁ֣ם <WH7218> upon their own heads נָתַ֔תִּי <WH5414> I will recompense נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> GOD

וַיִּשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> lift up הַכְּרוּבִים֙ <WH3742> Then did the cherubims אֶת־ <WH853> כַּנְפֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3671> their wings וְהָאֽוֹפַנִּ֖ים <WH212> and the wheels לְעֻמָּתָ֑ם <WH5980> beside וּכְב֧וֹד <WH3519> them and the glory אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> over מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> [was] over them above

וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <WH5927> went up כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> And the glory יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> over תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> from the midst הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> of the city וַֽיַּעֲמֹד֙ <WH5975> and stood עַל־ <WH5921> over הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> upon the mountain אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which מִקֶּ֥דֶם <WH6924> which [is] on the east side לָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> of the city

וְר֣וּחַ <WH7307> Afterwards the spirit נְשָׂאַ֗תְנִי <WH5375> took me up וַתְּבִיאֵ֤נִי <WH935> and brought כַשְׂדִּ֙ימָה֙ <WH3778> into Chaldea אֶל־ <WH413> to הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> to them of the captivity בַּמַּרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> me in a vision בְּר֣וּחַ <WH7307> by the Spirit אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <WH5927> went up מֵֽעָלַ֔י <WH5921> So הַמַּרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> So the vision אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i רָאִֽיתִי׃ <WH7200> that I had seen

וָאֲדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> Then I spake אֶל־ <WH413> about הַגּוֹלָ֑ה <WH1473> unto them of the captivity אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> all the things יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after הֶרְאָֽנִי׃ <WH7200> had shewed פ
